title: "Plot each year"
author: "Brian Burke"
date: '2023-03-13'
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

source("models/VAST_model.r")
source("prettyVASTPlot.r")
```

## Encounter Probability


```{r encounter, echo=FALSE}
prettyVastPlot(fit = fit, include_stations = FALSE, re = 's', process = 'encounter')

for (yy in sort(unique(df$Year))) print(prettyVastPlot(fit = fit, include_stations = FALSE, re = 'st', process = 'encounter', year = yy))
```

## Abundance


```{r abundance, echo=FALSE}

prettyVastPlot(fit = fit, include_stations = FALSE, re = 's', process = 'catch')

for (yy in sort(unique(df$Year))) print(prettyVastPlot(fit = fit, include_stations = FALSE, re = 'st', process = 'catch', year = yy))
```
